skills.name: Install PureScript
skills.pattern: npm install -g purescript spago

skills.name: spago init
skills.pattern: spago init

skills.name: spago build
skills.pattern: spago build

skills.name: spago run
skills.pattern: spago run

skills.name: Module Definition
skills.pattern:
module Main where

import Prelude

skills.name: Import
skills.pattern:
import Data.Array (filter, map)
import Effect.Console (log)

skills.name: Type Signature
skills.pattern:
add :: Int -> Int -> Int
add x y = x + y

skills.name: Type Alias
skills.pattern: type User = { name :: String, age :: Int }

skills.name: Data Type
skills.pattern: data Maybe a = Nothing | Just a

skills.name: Newtype
skills.pattern: newtype UserId = UserId Int

skills.name: Function Definition
skills.pattern:
double :: Int -> Int
double n = n * 2

skills.name: Pattern Matching
skills.pattern:
describe :: Maybe a -> String
describe Nothing = "empty"
describe (Just _) = "has value"

skills.name: Guards
skills.pattern:
abs :: Int -> Int
abs n
  | n < 0 = -n
  | otherwise = n

skills.name: Effect Monad
skills.pattern:
main :: Effect Unit
main = log "Hello, World!"

skills.name: Aff Monad
skills.pattern:
import Effect.Aff (Aff, launchAff_)
fetchData :: Aff String

skills.name: do Notation
skills.pattern:
main = do
  name <- getName
  log ("Hello " <> name)

skills.name: Record Syntax
skills.pattern:
user = { name: "John", age: 30 }
user.name -- access field

skills.name: Record Update
skills.pattern: user { age = 31 }

skills.name: Row Polymorphism
skills.pattern:
getName :: forall r. { name :: String | r } -> String
getName rec = rec.name

skills.name: Type Class
skills.pattern:
class Show a where
  show :: a -> String

skills.name: Instance
skills.pattern:
instance showUser :: Show User where
  show u = u.name

skills.name: Array Operations
skills.pattern:
import Data.Array
map (\x -> x * 2) [1, 2, 3]
filter (\x -> x > 0) arr

skills.name: Functor
skills.pattern: map (\x -> x + 1) (Just 5) -- Just 6

skills.name: Applicative
skills.pattern: (+) <$> Just 1 <*> Just 2 -- Just 3

skills.name: Monad
skills.pattern: Just 5 >>= (\x -> Just (x + 1)) -- Just 6

skills.name: FFI
skills.pattern: foreign import alert :: String -> Effect Unit

skills.name: Halogen
skills.pattern:
spago install halogen
import Halogen as H

skills.name: spago install
skills.pattern:
spago install aff
spago install halogen

skills.name: spago repl
skills.pattern:
spago repl
> 1 + 1
2
